name: Tales of Terazul
description:
support this project on Indiegogo

Tales of Terazul is a point and click game with a fantasy theme and some nuances of horror.

The series tells the journey of Red, an eleven-year-old that searches for her brother, who disappears inexplicably. Then, by an acident she ends up falling on a portal that takes her to Terazul, another world where magic is part of routine of the people, it's not a medieval world, it's a world like earth, but with magic and not always good magic.

It's in this familiar but strange world, that she searches clues to find her brother and wakes up something that can change the destiny of Terazul and the destiny of Earth as well.
